body.description: Seeking a nutrient-infused, sulfate-free shampoo for thinning hair? Pantene Pro-V Blends Rice Water Shampoo is a sulfate-free gentle wash crafted with a blend of potent rice water, Vitamin B5 and antioxidants to reduce hair loss and thinning due to breakage, protecting your hair's natural growth. This strengthening formula provides nutrient-rich sulfate free bond protection, to keep hair looking volumized and full with every wash. Every time you step into the shower, enjoy the protective cleanse of this sulfate-free shampoo. The Pantene Pro-V Blends Rice Water Collection has been developed to bring out the best of your hair, with nutrient-rich ingredients free from sulfates, silicones, parabens, dyes, and mineral oil. HOW TO USE Just massage into wet hair, lather, and rinse for gently cleansed, voluminous, full hair. For best results, follow with Pantene Pro-V Blends Rice Water Conditioner to help hair grow strong and long. We strive to bring you innovative formulas using proven ingredients, so that every product we make helps you face the world with confidence. Transform the hair you have to the hair you want for more great hair days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Shampoos Reduces Hair Loss Benefit Moisturize / Soothe Rice Water Key Ingredient Rose Water Sulfate Free Fuller Looking Hair Hair Need Moisturized Hair Color Safe Reduces Hair Loss Benefit Tames Frizz Rice Water Key Ingredient Argan Oil Sulfate Free Fuller Looking Hair Hair Need Smoother Hair Color Safe

How does rice water reduce hair loss and thinning? Rice water is full of minerals, vitamins, and amino acids, which can help protect your hair’s natural growth. Pantene Pro-V blends formula with Rice Water helps strengthen hair against damage and breakage. Is the shampoo clear or creamy? It’s a clear shampoo that’s clearly your choice for stronger, fuller-looking hair. Infused with a blend of rice water and Vitamin B5, it’s designed to reduce hair loss and thinning due to breakage. Do I need to use Pantene Pro-V Blends Rice Water Conditioner with this shampoo? For best results and more great hair days, it’s recommended to pair this shampoo with Pantene Pro-V Blends Rice Water Conditioner. However, it’s still effective when used alone without the matching conditioner. Is Pantene cruelty-free? Pantene has been committed to ending animal testing for over 30 years. We do not test our products on animals and have been actively working with governments around the world to put an end to animal testing for good. Why is sulfate-free important? While sulfates are a common cleaning ingredient, some Pantene fans prefer alternatives that are free from specific ingredients. With that in mind, we created formulas that are free sulfates, parabens, and silicones while still delivering great hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smelled great! Left my hair very shiny and soft!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe for color treated hair
reviews.reviewText: I really like this sulfate free shampoo. It cleans well, has a nice subtle fragrance, and is reasonably priced. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the right shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I have straight, baby-fine hair that has no body. I’ve spent the past 50 years trying various hair products to get some kind of shaping ability to my hair, rather than my skull. You can bet I’d given up hope. Enter Pantene’s sulfate-free shampoo. Not only does it give my hair a lot of body but I wake up the next morning and still have the bounce I thought I’d never had!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good shampoo. Left my hair in good condition. Very light scent. Expensive, but worth it for Pantene products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have long flat hair with no volume, and on top of that, I have oily scalp. My hair feels and looks more voluminous after the first wash! Today is day 3 and my hair feels alive. The bottle's appearance looks flimsy/cheap, but the product works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can’t get pump to pop up
reviews.reviewText: I could not get the pump on top of bottle to pop up to dispense product when trying to first open bottle. Very frustrating; I wish they would stop using these pop up pumps! I will contact customer service to see if they will send a replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy and you don’t need much. Plus for me it even works as conditioner, that was a big surprise.
